mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, `body` = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}, cateId = #{cateId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `Member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId AND A.displayStatus = 1 ORDER BY A.id DESC;
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `Member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.id = #{id};
SELECT A.*, M.nickname AS extra__writer FROM article AS A INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON M.id = A.memberId AND A.displayStatus = 1 AND A.boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.id DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET updateDate = NOW(), delDate = NOW(), delStatus = 1, displayStatus = 0 WHERE id = #{id};
